definition: to move/to shift/to change/to alter/to remove

sentences.english: The bone marrow of the chimerism mice was grafted into the host mice.
sentences.chinese: 最後將該嵌合體小鼠的骨髓移植到宿主體內。

sentences.english: Autologous bone marrow transplantation (ABMT ) is an alternative effective treatment for acute leukemias.
sentences.chinese: 自體骨髓移植是治療急性白血病的有效方法之一。

sentences.english: He is currently waiting for a bone marrow transplant.
sentences.chinese: 鑫龍現在急等骨髓移植的手術費用。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the feasibility of bone marrow hematopoietic stem cell transplantation in treating β-thalassemia major.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討骨髓移植治療重型地中海貧血的可行性。

sentences.english: Interstitial pneumonitis is one of the major causes of morbidity and mortality after bone marrow transplantation.
sentences.chinese: 間質性肺炎是骨髓移植後之主要致命原因之一。

sentences.english: Got leukaemia to still have other methods besides medullary transplanting?
sentences.chinese: 得了白血病除了骨髓移植還有其他的方法嗎？

sentences.english: Do medullary transplanting operation how to many money want probably excuse me?
sentences.chinese: 請問做骨髓移植手術大概要多少錢？

sentences.english: The author pointed out indwelling intravenous ducts under collarbone ensured smooth performance of marrow transplantation.
sentences.chinese: 留置鎖骨下靜脈導管保證了骨髓移植的順利進行。

sentences.english: A bone marrow transplant may be an effective treatment in some circumstances.
sentences.chinese: 另外，有時骨髓移植會很有效。

sentences.english: Treatment of these various diseases can range from simple medication to chemotherapy to bone marrow transplantation.
sentences.chinese: 治療方法很多，從簡單的藥物到化療到骨髓移植。

definition: to check for compatibility (for an organ transplant)
blood generating stem cells (in bone marrow)

pinyin: xin1 zang4 da1 qiao2 shou3 shu4

definition: to transfer (a patient) to a different hospital/to transfer to hospital (e.g. a prisoner)
to make a definite diagnosis/confirmed (case of a specific disease)
